title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, August 13, 2021
description: It’s the 60th birthday of author Tom Perrotta, whose novel “The Leftovers,” a story of what happens to those left behind after the rapture, is also a successful television show.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the 60th birthday of author Tom Perrotta, whose novel “The Leftovers,” a story of what happens to those left behind after the rapture, is also a successful television show.
